How Does This Work?

It's simple! All you have to do is follow us on Twitter at @GiveawaysClub, and retweet the current giveaway to enter! At the end of the giveaway, a random person who retweeted and is following will be picked as the winner.

What do I do if I win?

We will reach out to you, and all you have to do is respond to our twitter message with whatever information we need (e.g. Steam username)!
